attributes.action: Relax vehical laws surrounding modifiying vehicals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
including any add on or under car lighting and body works to the vehical and or engine modification.
  Not all modified cars are driven by boy racers and the car modifying scene is increasing as a social gathering of modified car owners worldwide.
  Car owners spend alot of hard earned money to make cars look and sound good but are restricted in showing them off!
Cruising is NOT a crime! neither should  Modifying be!
